comment._content: Granddaughter of Queen Victoria. Her wikipedia page, as Princess Margaret of Connaught: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret,_Crown_Princess_of_Sweden Bertil's wikipedia page: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Bertil,_Duke_of_Halland Ingrid's wikipedia page (she became Queen of Denmark): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ingrid_of_Sweden
